channel.title: CVE Feed for Martin Gibson -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Martin Gibson -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47237|2024-08-02T21:09:35.746Z -- martin%20gibson -- auto%20publish%20for%20google%20my%20business
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Martin Gibson Auto Publish for Google My Business plugin <= 3.7 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-47181|2024-08-02T21:01:22.833Z -- martin%20gibson -- ideapush
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Martin Gibson IdeaPush plugin <= 8.52 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-45832|2024-08-02T20:29:32.442Z -- martin%20gibson -- wp%20gotowebinar
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Martin Gibson WP GoToWebinar plugin <= 14.45 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-38776|2024-08-02T17:37:34.998Z -- martin%20gibson -- wp%20gotowebinar
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Martin Gibson WP GoToWebinar allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects WP GoToWebinar: from n/a through 15.7.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Martin Gibson WP GoToWebinar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP GoToWebinar: from n/a through 15.7.
